DOC.brief_summary: Pain front knee common condition treat physical therapist . Treatment may consist generalised strengthening exercise direct quadriceps muscle specific retrain aim restore motor control knee . This study compare two exercise program group people painfree time evaluate effect motor control . It hypothesise motor retrain program would influence motor control knee .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Two Exercise Programs Knee Motor Control
